Comments_List:
The course is held daily, which trained us to practice Arabic habitually throughout the semester. Students were given chance to practice speaking, reading, writing, and listening in class, they were all very helpful. 

I would like to practice more on Shami, although I acknowledged that Shami is a spoken dialect, I found it difficult to speak immediately after hearing from the video, it would be helpful if we could have the written form and the set of grammar rules.
The course is very student-oriented, it helps beginners to pick up words and simple conversation in short amount of time.
